episodes.title: #117 : Q&A #8 - MBP Fine Art Print Options Explained
episodes.author: Martin Bailey Photography K.K.
episodes.summary: The main thing to remember is if you aren't sure about the options, choose the defaults. This will always give the best results, and allows me the creative freedom to crop as necessary leaving a tasteful border. Of course you can always contact me with any queries too, and I'm open to specific requests that you can mail in advance or write into the optional comments field when ordering prints.
